text: Hulaŋ 21.16 Lo 24.7 sɨbɨlɨ agaŋ hulaŋ mu agadɨ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ mɨŋalɨvavɨla magɨla via uben aba lɨdaci igavɨla hulaŋ sɨbɨlɨ agadɨ ifɨhɨmɨhalaŋ aba abɨha uami. Hulaŋ sɨbɨlɨ agaŋ hulaŋ mu agadɨ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ mɨŋalɨvɨci nudɨ sibɨla hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ me hɨnidaci via ua mutɨŋ hɨvɨ lamɨci nudɨ lavavɨci igavɨla hulaŋ sɨbɨlɨ agadɨ ifɨhɨmɨhalaŋ aba abɨha uami.
